title: ISic001660. I.Sicily inscription 001660
body:
Facsimile Images

ὁ δᾶμος
τῶν Λιλυβαιιτᾶν
Διόγνητον
Δαματρίου Μήγα[ν]
5ε̣ὐ̣ε̣ρ̣γ̣έ̣τ̣α̣ν̣

Apparatus criticus

text checked against photograph

English translation

The people of the Lilybaitani honour Diognetos Megas, son of Damatrios as benefactor

commentary

bibliography

Di Stefano 1984 125-126 no. 155 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002035 Di Stefano 2006 547 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001365 Brugnone 2021 63 fig. 7 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002691
